project.name: Jesus Christ Saves Token
project.description_short: Faith-based XRPL asset focused on transparency, charity, and community engagement.
project.description_long: Jesus Christ Saves Token (JCS) is a faith-driven cryptocurrency issued on the XRP Ledger (XRPL). The website is a static, non-custodial front end that does not request or store private keys. Wallet actions happen in the user’s wallet or trusted XRPL apps. The project emphasizes verifiable on-ledger activity, transparent price derivation, and open review of client-side code.

verification_hints: Confirm issuer account and currency on multiple XRPL explorers.
Check trustline configuration and recent transactions for activity.

economics.supply_method: Derived from XRPL account_lines for issuer; may vary with ledger state.

safety.wallet_flow: External (e.g., XPMarket/Xaman) — users sign locally in their wallet.
known_risks: Crypto markets are volatile; prices can change rapidly.
IOU balances depend on trustlines and issuer policy on XRPL.
safety.disclaimer: Informational only; not financial advice. Always verify on-ledger.

how_to_recompute_price: Call XRPL book_offers for JCS/XRP and take best offer.
Convert XRP price to USD using a public endpoint (e.g., CoinGecko).
Multiply to obtain JCS/USD; compare with / index.html display.
how_to_check_supply: Query account_lines for issuer account and aggregate relevant line balances for JCS.
site_integrity: Scan HTML/JS for any private-key prompts (none expected).
Verify wallet actions are external links to trusted apps.

provenance.notes: Front-end was authored with the assistance of ChatGPT models and is open to inspection as static assets.
